name: rialto baby beanie
notes:
> **if you love this design, please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media (facebook, instagram, twitter, pinterest, etc). thank you!**
> 
> **[10% off all yarn at knitomatic.com, use discount code rav17 at check out!][1]** 
> (one use per person, we reserve the right to cancel offer at any time)


  [1]: https://knitomatic.myshopify.com/

**notes**
this hat is a fast & easy little gift that will impress for sure! it features a modified roll-brim edge with 2x2 ribbing, and the crown has a tied i-cord. it is made with 2 co-ordinating shades of yarn, one solid colour and one self striping. 

**size**
° preemie (newborn, baby, toddler)
° head circumference: 11(12-13, 14-15, 16-17)” or 27.5(30-32.5, 35-  37.5, 40-42.5)cm

**materials**
° debbie bliss rialto dk print;
   50g/105m, 1 ball
° debbie bliss cashmerino dk;
   50g/110m (or debbie bliss rialto
   dk), 1 ball
° 4mm-16” circular needles
° 3.5mm-16” circular needles
° 4mm double pointed needles
° 1 stitch marker
° darning needle (preferably
   pointy & small)
